results.name: A generalized Chamberland function.
comment: The orbit of a(n) beginning at 1 is A138894.
reference: M. Chamberland, A Continuous Extension of the 3x+1 Problem to the Real Line, Dynamics of Continuous, Discrete and Impulsive Dynamical Systems 2(1996), 495-509
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-3,4,-3,2,-1).
